attributes.action: hold an immediate referendum to find out if the taxpayers of this country are prepared to keep Abu Qatadar in a life of luxury for the rest of his natural.  If they are not then he should immediately be deported
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayers of this country are being ridiculed by our judiciary.  This man should NOT be eligible for treatment under the HRA, he is from a country which does not have its own HRA so why should our HRA apply to him.  This man should not be entitled to receive one single penny from our  taxpayer funded welfare benefits system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
